Newbie Guide:
First, catch Grey Keltir or the Dominant Grey Keltir in the less dangerous areas of town. After you have acquired some experience, try to catch the Black Wolf or Dominant Black Wolf. Be cautious: the wolves in this area may be too strong for you right now!
Here's a tip so for determining the power and skill of a monster: when you target the monster, you will see its name in the upper-central part of the screen; the color of the monster's name signifies its strength. Attack only white or light blue monsters in the beginning. Yellow and red monsters are stronger than you are, so do not attack them carelessly.
